Site Info

I made this as a personal reference for running Grandmaster Nightfalls, and also because I like making websites.

If you like video guides, I recommend the short and sweet guides by Mactics.

I also have a similar reference site for Legend Lost Sectors.

Contact

Send errors, issues, comments, etc. to densemint [at] gmail [dot] com.

Colophon

  • Built with Eleventy and hosted on Netlify.
  • Fonts: Inter by Rasmus Andersson, Migra by Pangram Pangram, and Inconsolata by Raph Levien.
